VASSAL.build.module.map

Class CounterDetailViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.build.AbstractBuildable
      • VASSAL.build.AbstractConfigurable
        • VASSAL.build.module.map.CounterDetailViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, AutoConfigurable, Buildable, Configurable, Drawable, PropertyNameSource, ValidityChecker, Translatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalMap.CounterViewer

    public class CounterDetailViewer
extends AbstractConfigurable
implements Drawable, java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This is a Drawable class that draws the counters horizontally when the mouse is held over a stack with the control key down.

        public void setAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.Object value)
        Description copied from class: AbstractBuildable
        Sets an attribute value for this component. The key parameter will be one of those listed in AbstractBuildable.getAttributeNames(). If the value parameter is a String, it will be the value returned by AbstractBuildable.getAttributeValueString(java.lang.String) for the same key. If the implementing class extends AbstractConfigurable, then value will be an instance of the corresponding Class listed in AbstractConfigurable.getAttributeTypes()
